metadata.author: Acronis - support@acronis.com
metadata.comments: Solution template for Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: AcronisLoginFromAbnormalIPLowOccurrence_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
Suspicious login from an IP address observed up to two times in the last two weeks.
properties.displayName: Acronis - Login from Abnormal IP - Low Occurrence
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis audit"
| extend initiator_ip = tostring(parse_json(DeviceCustomString1).initiator_ip)
| summarize LoginCount = count() by initiator_ip
| where LoginCount <= 2
| order by LoginCount asc

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Acronis - Login from Abnormal IP ({{initiator_ip}}) - Low Occurrence ({{LoginCount}})

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Analytics Rule 1

properties.displayName: Acronis - Login from Abnormal IP - Low Occurrence

properties.description: AcronisMultipleEndpointsAccessingMaliciousURLs_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
Multiple endpoints accessing malicious URLs could indicate an ongoing phishing attack, with several employees interacting with those URLs.
properties.displayName: Acronis - Multiple Endpoints Accessing Malicious URLs
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "MaliciousUrlDetected"
| summarize MaliciousUrlDetected = count() by DeviceName

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Analytics Rule 2

properties.displayName: Acronis - Multiple Endpoints Accessing Malicious URLs

properties.description: AcronisMultipleEndpointsInfectedByRansomware_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
Detects when three or more distinct endpoints report ransomware detections within a single day.
properties.displayName: Acronis - Multiple Endpoints Infected by Ransomware
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "ActiveProtectionBlocksSuspiciousActivity"
| summarize ActiveProtectionBlocksSuspiciousActivity = count() by DeviceName

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Analytics Rule 3

properties.displayName: Acronis - Multiple Endpoints Infected by Ransomware

properties.description: AcronisMultipleInboxesWithMaliciousContentDetected_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
Many inboxes containing malicious content could indicate a potential ongoing phishing attack.
properties.displayName: Acronis - Multiple Inboxes with Malicious Content Detected
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID in
("MaliciousURLDetectedInM365MailboxBackup",
"MalwareDetectedInM365MailboxBackup",
"MaliciousEmailDetectedPerceptionPointWarning")
| summarize MaliciousContent = count() by DeviceName

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Analytics Rule 4

properties.displayName: Acronis - Multiple Inboxes with Malicious Content Detected

properties.description: AcronisAgentFailedUpdatingMoreThanTwiceInADay_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Agent failed updating more than twice in a day
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "AgentAutoUpdateStalled"
| summarize FailureCount = count() by DeviceName, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| where FailureCount > 2
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

tags.name: description
tags.value: The following devices have failed agent updates more than two times.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 1

properties.displayName: Acronis - Agent failed updating more than twice in a day

properties.description: AcronisAgentsOfflineFor2DaysOrMore_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Agents offline for 2 days or more
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "MiniPlanAgentOffline"
| summarize DaysSeen = dcount(startofday(TimeGenerated)) by DeviceName
| where DaysSeen >= 2
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query to find agents that have been offline for two days or longer.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 2

properties.displayName: Acronis - Agents offline for 2 days or more

properties.description: AcronisAuditLog_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Audit Log
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis audit"
| extend EventDetails = parse_json(DeviceCustomString1)
| extend initiator_ip = tostring(EventDetails.initiator_ip)
| extend created_at = todatetime(EventDetails.created_at)
| extend IP_0_Address = initiator_ip

tags.name: description
tags.value: Records user and system operations in the management portal and Cyber Protect console, including scripting, quota, and email archiving events.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 3

properties.displayName: Acronis - Audit Log

properties.description: AcronisCloudConnectionErrors_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Cloud Connection Errors
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID in
("CloudConnectionS3CloudAccessExpired",
"CloudConnectionAzureCloudAccessExpired",
"CloudConnectionAzureApplianceUpdateFailed",
"CloudConnectionAzureApplianceFailed",
"CloudConnectionAzureApplianceEOL",
"CloudConnectionAzureApplianceDeletionFailed",
"CloudConnectionAzureApplianceDeallocationFailed",
"CloudConnectionAzureApplianceConfigurationFailed")
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Various errors related to S3 or Azure cloud connections.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 4

properties.displayName: Acronis - Cloud Connection Errors

properties.description: AcronisEndpointsAccessingMaliciousURLs_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints Accessing Malicious URLs
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "MaliciousUrlDetected"
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Multiple endpoints accessing malicious URLs could indicate an ongoing phishing attack, with several employees interacting with those URLs.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 5

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints Accessing Malicious URLs

properties.description: AcronisEndpointsInfectedByRansomware_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints Infected by Ransomware
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "ActiveProtectionBlocksSuspiciousActivity"
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 6

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints Infected by Ransomware

properties.description: AcronisEndpointsWithBackupIssues_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints with Backup issues
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID in
("BackupNotResponding",
"BackupRecoveryFailed",
"BackupFailed",
"ArchiveCorrupted")
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 7

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints with Backup issues

properties.description: AcronisEndpointsWithEDRIncidents_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints with EDR Incidents
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID in ("EDRIncidentDetected", "EDRIOCDetected")
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

tags.name: description
tags.value: A high number of endpoints with multiple incidents could indicate an ongoing attack.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 8

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints with EDR Incidents

properties.description: AcronisEndpointsWithHighFailedLoginAttempts_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints with high failed login attempts
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "MiMonitoringFailedLoginAttemptsOverThreshold"
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Multiple endpoints with a high number of failed login attempts could indicate a password spraying attack, where an attacker tries different credentials across several machines.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 9

properties.displayName: Acronis - Endpoints with high failed login attempts

properties.description: AcronisInboxesWithMaliciousContentDetected_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Inboxes with Malicious Content
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID in
("MaliciousURLDetectedInM365MailboxBackup",
"MalwareDetectedInM365MailboxBackup",
"MaliciousEmailDetectedPerceptionPointWarning")
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Many inboxes containing malicious content could indicate a potential ongoing phishing attack.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 10

properties.displayName: Acronis - Inboxes with Malicious Content

properties.description: AcronisLoginFromAbnormalIPLowOccurrence_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Login from Abnormal IP - Low Occurrence
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis audit"
| extend initiator_ip = tostring(parse_json(DeviceCustomString1).initiator_ip)
| summarize LoginCount = count() by initiator_ip
| where LoginCount <= 2
| order by LoginCount asc
| extend IP_0_Address = initiator_ip

tags.name: description
tags.value: Suspicious login from an IP address observed up to two times.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 11

properties.displayName: Acronis - Login from Abnormal IP - Low Occurrence

properties.description: AcronisProtectionServiceErrors_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - Protection Service Errors
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID in
("ProtectionServiceNotWorking",
"ActiveProtectionDriverRemediated",
"ActiveProtectionServiceNotRunning",
"ActiveProtectionServiceNotAvailable",
"ActiveProtectionServiceFailureToApplyPolicy",
"ActiveProtectionServiceConflict",
"ActiveProtectionInvalidNetworkRecoveryPath",
"CPSProtectionFailureDetected")
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

tags.name: description
tags.value: Various errors related to Active Protection or CPS malfunctions.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 12

properties.displayName: Acronis - Protection Service Errors

properties.description: AcronisUnauthorizedOperationIsDetected_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 3.0.0

properties.displayName: Acronis - ASZ defence: Unauthorized operation is detected and blocked
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Acronis"
| where DeviceEventClassID in ("ActiveProtectionDetectedAszPartitionAccessed")
| extend Host_0_HostName = DeviceName

tags.name: description
tags.value: An attempt to modify the protected Acronis Secure Zone partition was blocked.

properties.description: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Hunting Query 13

properties.displayName: Acronis - ASZ defence: Unauthorized operation is detected and blocked
Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud
properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

Review the solution Release Notes

There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables companies to ingest Acronis alerts, events, and activities into Microsoft Sentinel. The data is initially stored on a device on the company network using the Acronis agent as a writer. See Acronis SIEM Connector documentation here The integration includes custom Acronis detection rules and hunting queries to help companies proactively hunt for threats.

Analytic Rules: 4, Hunting Queries: 13

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
